DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , open label , randomize study . Patients randomize one follow arm allocation ratio 3:1 , respectively : Arm A : CP-675,206 + neoadjuvant hormone therapy ( NHT ) OR Arm B : neoadjuvant hormone therapy . After randomization , patient receive study treatment three cycle ( one cycle define 28 day ) . After completion three cycle , patient undergo prostatectomy pathology assessment complete central laboratory , Armed Forces Institute Pathology ( AFIP ) Washington , DC .
